thread.section_title: Burgers' Smokehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Burgers' Smokehouse | smokehouse.com
thread.title: Bob & Debbie Penn
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Bob & Debbie Penn

author: Bob & Debbie Penn
title: Bob & Debbie Penn
text: We love the pork we get from Burgers! We also loved the extra pork patties that came with our link sausage order. I am amazed at all the products on your website. We will be ordering more items in the future. Delivery was very fast. We received our product within a couple of days of placing our order.
